Reviews.Title: Great PC
Reviews.Author: Grae Bollinger
Reviews.Content: Great computer, great price, and all around a very great purchase. Couldn't have asked for a better deal. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great price and great processor.
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: I needed a processor that would be a little faster than the ones I have  but not anything professional and this computer seems to do the trick.

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 8 - 64-bit version - 3rd Generation Intel Quad Core i7-3632QM processor (2.2GHz/3.2GHz w/ Turbo Boost)
4GB DDR3 memory - 500GB hard drive - 15.6" HD widescreen CineCrystal LCD display (1366 x 768)
Intel HD Graphics 4000 w/ 128MB of dedicated system memory - Mobile Intel HM77 Express chipset - 8X DVD±RW DL
webcam - multi-gesture touchpad - Wi-Fi - Gigabit LAN - Bluetooth - HDMI - USB 3.0 - card reader
Color:   Midnight Black
ProductInfo.Name: Acer 15.6" Aspire Windows 8 Laptop 4GB 500GB | V3-571-9401
